targets.rawSql:
WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    5 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        key as label,
        if(value_diff >= 0, value_diff / time_diff, 0) as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            time,
            key,
            value,
            value - lagInFrame(value, 1, value) OVER (PARTITION BY key ORDER BY time) as value_diff,
            toUnixTimestamp(time) - lagInFrame(toUnixTimestamp(time), 1, toUnixTimestamp(time)) OVER (PARTITION BY key ORDER BY time) as time_diff
        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
                Attributes['key'] as key,
                max(Value) as value
            FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
            WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_cache_request_total'
                AND Attributes['key'] IN array($key)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
                AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
                AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            GROUP BY time, key
        )
    )
    WHERE key <> '' AND time_diff > 0
)
ORDER BY label

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    10 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        key as label,
        if(value_diff >= 0, value_diff / time_diff, 0) as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            time,
            key,
            value,
            value - lagInFrame(value, 1, value) OVER (PARTITION BY key ORDER BY time) as value_diff,
            toUnixTimestamp(time) - lagInFrame(toUnixTimestamp(time), 1, toUnixTimestamp(time)) OVER (PARTITION BY key ORDER BY time) as time_diff
        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
                Attributes['key'] as key,
                max(Value) as value
            FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
            WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_cache_request_errors'
                AND Attributes['key'] IN array($key)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
                AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
                AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            GROUP BY time, key
        )
    )
    WHERE key <> '' AND time_diff > 0
)
ORDER BY label

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    5 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        key as label,
        if(total_diff > 0 AND miss_diff >= 0, miss_diff / total_diff, 0) as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            time,
            key,
            miss_val - lagInFrame(miss_val, 1, miss_val) OVER (PARTITION BY key ORDER BY time) as miss_diff,
            total_val - lagInFrame(total_val, 1, total_val) OVER (PARTITION BY key ORDER BY time) as total_diff
        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
                Attributes['key'] as key,
                sumIf(Value, MetricName = 'rivet_cache_value_miss_total') as miss_val,
                sumIf(Value, MetricName = 'rivet_cache_value_total') as total_val
            FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
            WHERE MetricName IN ('rivet_cache_value_miss_total', 'rivet_cache_value_total')
                AND Attributes['key'] IN array($key)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
                AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
                AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            GROUP BY time, key
        )
    )
    WHERE key <> ''
)
ORDER BY label

    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    5 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,

FROM (

        key as label,

        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
                Attributes['key'] as key,
                max(Value) as value
            FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
            WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_cache_value_empty_total'

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    5 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        key as label,
        if(total_diff > 0 AND empty_diff >= 0, empty_diff / total_diff, 0) as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            time,
            key,
            empty_val - lagInFrame(empty_val, 1, empty_val) OVER (PARTITION BY key ORDER BY time) as empty_diff,
            total_val - lagInFrame(total_val, 1, total_val) OVER (PARTITION BY key ORDER BY time) as total_diff
        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
                Attributes['key'] as key,
                sumIf(Value, MetricName = 'rivet_cache_value_empty_total') as empty_val,
                sumIf(Value, MetricName = 'rivet_cache_value_total') as total_val
            FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
            WHERE MetricName IN ('rivet_cache_value_empty_total', 'rivet_cache_value_total')
                AND Attributes['key'] IN array($key)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
                AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
                AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            GROUP BY time, key
        )
    )
    WHERE key <> ''
)
ORDER BY label

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.project']
list.label: project
list.name: project
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.project']

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project) ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter']
list.label: datacenter
list.name: datacenter
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project) ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter']

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['key'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_cache_request_total' AND ServiceName = 'rivet' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter) ORDER BY Attributes['key']
list.label: key
list.name: key
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['key'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_cache_request_total' AND ServiceName = 'rivet' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter) ORDER BY Attributes['key']
